Room.Name: The Dragon's Claw Tavern and Grill
Room.ShortDescription: You are in one of the nicer bars in the southeastern section of town.
Room.LongDescription: The Dragon's Claw Tavern and Grill provides a good meal at a good price with all the ale you can drink. The grill is located outside the bar, and serves steaks, venison and other meats from all over the land. This is a good place to meet people and have a bite to eat. Numerous people wander in and out of here, going about their own business.
